snippet: “CBS This Morning” was supposed to set itself apart from its competitors with more news, but much of the first show looked a lot like those others.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley The TV Watch column on the debut of CBS This Morning, which had promised more news coverage than other morning shows.
lead_paragraph: “CBS This Morning” was supposed to set itself apart from its competitors with more news, but much of the first show looked a lot like those others.

headline.seo: ‘CBS This Morning’ Makes Debut With Charlie Rose
headline.main: Painting Bold Promises at CBS With Bright Morning Colors
headline.print_headline: Painting Bold Promises at CBS With Bright Morning Colors
